Detailed Description

template<class TestFixture>
class gaia::testing::GaiaTestCase< TestFixture >

Save the dependencies of gaia component classes(Provider and Delegate).

Inherited by gaia::testing::DelegateTestCase, gaia::testing::ProviderTestCase.

TestFixture is extend from gtest/testing/test

template<class TestFixture >
void gaia::testing::GaiaTestCase< TestFixture >::SetContext ( core::Context *  context)

Get the Interface to global information about an application environment.

So we can access to application-specific resources and classes, as well as up-calls for application-level operations such as launching activities, broadcasting and receiving intents, etc.

Definition at line 118 of file GaiaTestCase.h.

template<class TestFixture >
void gaia::testing::GaiaTestCase< TestFixture >::SetTestContext ( core::Context *  context)

Test context can be used to access resources from the test's own package as opposed to the resources from the test target package.

Access to the latter is provided by the context set with the SetContext method.

Definition at line 128 of file GaiaTestCase.h.

Definition at line 143 of file GaiaTestCase.h.

Referenced by gaia::testing::ProviderTestCase< TextendsContentProvider, TestFixture >::SetUp(), and gaia::testing::DelegateTestCase< TestDelegate, TestFixture >::SetUp().

template<class TestFixture >
void gaia::testing::GaiaTestCase< TestFixture >::SetUpTestCase ( ) [static]

Sets up the stuff shared by all tests in this test case.

Testing will call Foo::SetUpTestCase() before running the first test in test case Foo. Hence a sub-class can define its own SetUpTestCase() method to shadow the one defined in the super class.

Definition at line 101 of file GaiaTestCase.h.

template<class TestFixture >
void gaia::testing::GaiaTestCase< TestFixture >::TearDown ( ) [protected, virtual]

Tears down the test fixture.

Definition at line 150 of file GaiaTestCase.h.

Referenced by gaia::testing::ProviderTestCase< TextendsContentProvider, TestFixture >::TearDown(), and gaia::testing::DelegateTestCase< TestDelegate, TestFixture >::TearDown().

template<class TestFixture >
void gaia::testing::GaiaTestCase< TestFixture >::TearDownTestCase ( ) [static]

Tears down the stuff shared by all tests in this test case.

Testing will call Foo::TearDownTestCase() after running the last test in test case Foo. Hence a sub-class can define its own TearDownTestCase() method to shadow the one defined in the super class.
